original_text: To Gershon belonged the clan of the Libnites and the clan of the Shimeites; these were the clans of the Gershonites.
korean_text: 게르손에게서는 립니 종족과 시므이 종족이 났으니 이들이 곧 게르손의 조상의 가문들이라

sentences.original_text: To Gershon belonged the clan of the Libnites
and the clan of the Shimeites
these were the clans of the Gershonites
